trans-unit.source: The secondary_ip_range block supports: * range_name - (Required) The name associated with this subnetwork secondary range, used when adding an alias IP range to a VM instance. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035. The name must be unique within the subnetwork. * ip_cidr_range - (Required) The range of IP addresses belonging to this subnetwork secondary range. Provide this property when you create the subnetwork. Ranges must be unique and non-overlapping with all primary and secondary IP ranges within a network. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 所述 secondary_ip_range 块支持：* range_name - （必需）与该子网次级范围相关联的名称，使用的添加的别名IP范围到虚拟机实例时。名称必须为1-63个字符长，并符合RFC1035。该名称在子网中必须唯一。* ip_cidr_range -（必填）属于此子网二级范围的IP地址范围。创建子网时提供此属性。范围必须是唯一的，并且不能与网络中的所有主要和次要IP范围重叠。仅支持IPv4。

trans-unit.source: The terraform apply command is used to apply the changes required to reach the desired state of the configuration, or the pre-determined set of actions generated by a terraform plan execution plan.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform apply 命令用于施加到达配置的期望状态所需要的变化，或预先确定的一组由一个生成动作 terraform plan 的执行计划。

trans-unit.source: The terraform apply command now requires a version number to be provided:
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform apply 命令现在需要将提供版本号：

trans-unit.source: The terraform console command can be used in non-interactive scripts by piping newline-separated commands to it. Only the output from the final command is outputted unless an error occurs earlier.
trans-unit.target: 通过将以换行符分隔的命令管道化，可以在非交互式脚本中使用 terraform console 命令。除非较早发生错误，否则仅输出最终命令的输出。

trans-unit.source: The terraform console command creates an interactive console for using interpolations.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform console 命令创建用于使用交互控制台插值。

trans-unit.source: The terraform console command will read configured state even if it is remote. This is great for scripting state reading in CI environments or other remote scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform console 命令将读取配置状态即使它是远程。这对于在CI环境或其他远程方案中编写脚本状态读取非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The terraform destroy command is used to destroy the Terraform-managed infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform destroy 命令用于销毁Terraform管理基础设施。

trans-unit.source: The terraform env command is deprecated. The terraform workspace command should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform env 命令已被弃用。所述 terraform workspace 命令应该被代替使用。

trans-unit.source: The terraform fmt command is used to rewrite Terraform configuration files to a canonical format and style.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform fmt 命令用于对terraform配置文件重写为规范格式和风格。

trans-unit.source: The terraform get command is used to download and update modules mentioned in the root module.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform get 命令用于下载和更新模块根模块中提及。

trans-unit.source: The terraform graph command is used to generate a visual representation of either a configuration or execution plan. The output is in the DOT format, which can be used by GraphViz to generate charts.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform graph 命令用于产生任一配置或执行计划的可视化表示。输出为DOT格式，GraphViz可以使用该格式生成图表。

trans-unit.source: The terraform graph command is used to generate a visual representation of either a configuration or execution plan. The output is in the DOT format, which can be used by GraphViz to generate charts.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform graph 命令用于产生任一配置或执行计划的可视化表示。输出为DOT格式，GraphViz可以使用该格式生成图表。

trans-unit.source: The terraform import command is used to import existing resources into Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform import 命令用于现有资源导入到Terraform。

trans-unit.source: The terraform import command is used to import existing infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform import 命令用于导入现有的基础设施。

trans-unit.source: The terraform init command is used to initialize a working directory containing Terraform configuration files. This is the first command that should be run after writing a new Terraform configuration or cloning an existing one from version control. It is safe to run this command multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform init 指令被用来初始化含有Terraform配置文件的工作目录。这是在编写新的Terraform配置或从版本控制克隆现有配置后应运行的第一个命令。多次运行此命令是安全的。

trans-unit.source: The terraform init command should be run by any member of your team on any Terraform configuration as a first step. It is safe to execute multiple times and performs all the setup actions required for a Terraform environment, including initializing the backend.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform init 命令应该由你的团队的任何Terraform配置作为第一步，任何成员运行。执行多次并执行Terraform环境所需的所有设置操作（包括初始化后端）是安全的。

trans-unit.source: The terraform init command will download and cache any modules referenced by a configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform init 命令将下载并缓存由配置所引用的任何模块。

trans-unit.source: The terraform output command is used to extract the value of an output variable from the state file.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform output 命令被用于提取从所述状态文件的输出变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The terraform plan command is used to create an execution plan. Terraform performs a refresh, unless explicitly disabled, and then determines what actions are necessary to achieve the desired state specified in the configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform plan 命令用来创建的执行计划。除非明确禁用，否则Terraform会执行刷新，然后确定要实现配置文件中指定的所需状态需要执行哪些操作。

trans-unit.source: The terraform providers command prints information about the providers used in the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform providers 命令有关当前配置中使用的提供者的信息打印。

trans-unit.source: The terraform push command uploads your Terraform configuration to be managed by HashiCorp's Terraform Enterprise. Terraform Enterprise can automatically run Terraform for you, save all state transitions, save plans, and keep a history of all Terraform runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform push 命令上传你的Terraform配置由HashiCorp的管理Terraform企业。Terraform Enterprise可以自动为您运行Terraform，保存所有状态转换，保存计划并保留所有Terraform运行的历史记录。

trans-unit.source: The terraform refresh command is used to reconcile the state Terraform knows about (via its state file) with the real-world infrastructure. This can be used to detect any drift from the last-known state, and to update the state file.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform refresh 命令是用来与现实世界的基础设施，以调和Terraform知道的状态（通过其状态文件）。这可用于检测自最后一个已知状态的任何漂移，并更新状态文件。

trans-unit.source: The terraform show command is used to provide human-readable output from a state or plan file. This can be used to inspect a plan to ensure that the planned operations are expected, or to inspect the current state as Terraform sees it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform show 命令用于提供人类可读从状态或计划文件输出。这可用于检查计划以确保预期的计划操作，或用于检查Terraform认为的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state list command is used to list resources within a Terraform state.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform state list 命令用于列出资源中Terraform状态。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state mv command is used to move items in a Terraform state. This command can move single resources, single instances of a resource, entire modules, and more. This command can also move items to a completely different state file, enabling efficient refactoring.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform state mv 命令用于在移动项目Terraform状态。此命令可以移动单个资源，资源的单个实例，整个模块等等。此命令还可以将项目移动到完全不同的状态文件，从而实现高效的重构。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state pull command is used to manually download and output the state from remote state. This command also works with local state.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform state pull 命令被从用于手动下载和输出的状态远程状态。此命令也适用于本地状态。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state push command is used to manually upload a local state file to remote state. This command also works with local state.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform state push 命令用于手动上传的局部状态文件到远程状态。此命令也适用于本地状态。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state rm command is used to remove items from the Terraform state. This command can remove single resources, single instances of a resource, entire modules, and more.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform state rm 命令用于删除的项目Terraform状态。此命令可以删除单个资源，一个资源的单个实例，整个模块等等。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state show command is used to show the attributes of a single resource in the Terraform state.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform state show 命令用于显示在一个单一的资源的属性Terraform状态。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state command is used for advanced state management. As your Terraform usage becomes more advanced, there are some cases where you may need to modify the Terraform state. Rather than modify the state directly, the terraform state commands can be used in many cases instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform state 命令用于先进的状态管理。随着Terraform用法的发展，某些情况下可能需要修改Terraform状态。代替直接修改状态，可以在许多情况下使用 terraform state 命令。

trans-unit.source: The terraform state subcommands make heavy use of resource addressing for targeting and filtering specific resources and modules within the state.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform state 子大量使用资源寻址状态中的定位和过滤特定的资源和模块。

trans-unit.source: The terraform taint command manually marks a Terraform-managed resource as tainted, forcing it to be destroyed and recreated on the next apply.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform taint 命令手动标记作为一个污染Terraform管理资源，迫使它被破坏并重新创建的下一个应用。

trans-unit.source: The terraform untaint command manually unmarks a Terraform-managed resource as tainted, restoring it as the primary instance in the state. This reverses either a manual terraform taint or the result of provisioners failing on a resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform untaint 命令手动取消标记一个Terraform管理资源作为污点，恢复它作为的状态下的主实例。这既可以逆转手动 terraform taint 也可以逆转供应商在资源上失败的结果。

trans-unit.source: The terraform validate command is used to validate the syntax of the terraform files. Terraform performs a syntax check on all the terraform files in the directory, and will display an error if any of the files doesn't validate.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform validate 命令用于验证terraform文件的语法。Terraform对目录中的所有Terraform文件执行语法检查，如果任何文件未通过验证，将显示错误。

trans-unit.source: The terraform workspace delete command is used to delete an existing workspace.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform workspace delete 命令用于删除现有工作空间。

trans-unit.source: The terraform workspace list command is used to list all existing workspaces.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform workspace list 命令用于列出所有现有工作区。

trans-unit.source: The terraform workspace new command is used to create a new workspace.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform workspace new 命令用于创建一个新的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The terraform workspace select command is used to choose a different workspace to use for further operations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform workspace select 命令用于选择不同的工作区以用于进一步的操作。

trans-unit.source: The terraform workspace command is used to manage workspaces.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform workspace 命令用于管理工作空间。

trans-unit.source: The terraform CLI tool includes several provisioner plugins for immediate use. It does not include any Providers, due to the large number of them and the various supported versions. Terraform reads configuration files and installs the needed Providers automatically from releases.hashicorp.com. At time of writing Terraform can only automatically install Providers distributed by HashiCorp, which are found on releases.hashicorp.com.
trans-unit.target: terraform CLI工具包括多个可立即使用的预配器插件。它不包括任何提供程序，因为它们数量众多且受支持的版本不同。Terraform会从releases.hashicorp.com读取配置文件并自动安装所需的提供程序。在撰写本文时，Terraform只能自动安装HashiCorp发行的Provider，可以在releases.hashicorp.com上找到它们。

trans-unit.source: The terraform block configures the behavior of Terraform itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 terraform 块配置Terraform本身的行为。

trans-unit.source: The terraform configuration section is used to configure Terraform itself, such as requiring a minimum Terraform version to execute a configuration.
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform 配置部用于配置Terraform本身，如需要最小Terraform版本来执行的结构。

trans-unit.source: The terraform_remote_state data source will return all of the root outputs defined in the referenced remote state, an example output might look like:
trans-unit.target: 所述 terraform_remote_state 数据源将返回所有的引用的远程状态定义的根输出，示例输出可能看起来像：

trans-unit.source: The test block supports:
trans-unit.target: 在 test 块支持：

trans-unit.source: The thumbnail_config object specifies information about the Amazon S3 bucket in which you want Elastic Transcoder to save thumbnail files: which bucket to use, which users you want to have access to the files, the type of access you want users to have, and the storage class that you want to assign to the files. If you specify values for content_config, you must also specify values for thumbnail_config even if you don't want to create thumbnails. (You control whether to create thumbnails when you create a job. For more information, see ThumbnailPattern in the topic Create Job.) If you specify values for content_config and thumbnail_config, omit the OutputBucket object.
trans-unit.target: 该 thumbnail_config 这桶使用，要访问这些文件，你希望用户能够访问的类型的用户，并且存储：对象指定有关要在其中弹性转码器保存缩略图文件亚马逊S3存储信息您要分配给文件的类。如果您为 content_config 指定值，那么即使您不想创建缩略图，也必须为 thumbnail_config 指定值。 （您可以控制在创建作业时是否创建缩略图。有关更多信息，请参阅主题创建作业中的ThumbnailPattern。）如果为 content_config 和 thumbnail_config 指定值，则省略OutputBucket对象。

trans-unit.target: 所述 thumbnail_config 对象支持以下功能：

trans-unit.target: 该 topic 通知配置支持以下功能：

trans-unit.target: 所述 transition 对象支持以下

trans-unit.target: 所述 trigger_template 块支持：

trans-unit.source: The triggers argument allows specifying an arbitrary set of values that, when changed, will cause the resource to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triggers 参数允许指定，改变时，将导致要被替换的资源值的任意集合。

trans-unit.source: The triton_account data source queries Triton for Account information.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_account 数据源查询的Triton的帐户信息。

trans-unit.source: The triton_datacenter data source queries Triton for Data Center information.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_datacenter 数据源海卫查询数据中心的信息。

trans-unit.source: The triton_fabric resource represents an fabric for a Triton account. The fabric is a logical set of interconnected switches.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triton_fabric 资源表示为曲通帐户的织物。结构是互连交换机的逻辑集合。

trans-unit.source: The triton_fabric_network data source queries Triton for Fabric Network information (e.g., subnet CIDR, gateway, state routes, etc.) based on the name of the Fabric Network and ID of the VLAN on which the network has been created.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triton_fabric_network 数据源查询的Triton为结构Network基于织物网络的名称和其上的网络已被创建的VLAN ID的信息（例如，子网CIDR，网关，路由状态，等等）。

trans-unit.source: The triton_fabric_vlan data source queries Triton for Fabric VLAN information (e.g., VLAN ID, etc.) based either on the name, VLAN ID or description of the Fabric VLAN.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triton_fabric_vlan 数据源查询的Triton用于织物VLAN上的名称，VLAN ID或织物VLAN的描述基于任一信息（例如，VLAN ID，等等）。

trans-unit.source: The triton_firewall_rule resource represents a rule for the Triton cloud firewall.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_firewall_rule 资源代表了海卫云防火墙的规则。

trans-unit.source: The triton_image data source queries the Triton Image API for an image ID based on a variety of different parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triton_image 数据源将查询基于各种不同参数的图像ID的图像的Triton API。

trans-unit.source: The triton_instance_template resource represents a Triton Service Group instance template.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_instance_template 资源代表的Triton服务组实例模板。

trans-unit.source: The triton_key resource represents an SSH key for a Triton account.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_key 资源代表曲通帐户的SSH密钥。

trans-unit.source: The triton_machine resource represents a virtual machine or infrastructure container running in Triton.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_machine 资源代表的Triton运行的虚拟机或基础设施容器。

trans-unit.source: The triton_network data source queries Triton for Network information (e.g., Network ID, etc.) based on the name of the Network.
trans-unit.target: 所述 triton_network 数据源查询的Triton用于基于所述网络的名称的网络信息（例如，网络ID等）。

trans-unit.source: The triton_service_group resource represents a Triton Service Group.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_service_group 资源代表的Triton服务组。

trans-unit.source: The triton_snapshot resource represents a snapshot of a Triton machine. Snapshots are not usable with other instances; they are a point-in-time snapshot of the current instance. Snapshots can also only be taken of instances that are not of brand kvm.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_snapshot 资源代表的Triton机的快照。快照不能与其他实例一起使用。它们是当前实例的时间点快照。快照也只能拍摄非 kvm 品牌的实例。

trans-unit.source: The triton_vlan resource represents an Triton VLAN. A VLAN provides a low level way to segregate and subdivide the network. Traffic on one VLAN cannot, on its own, reach another VLAN.
trans-unit.target: 该 triton_vlan 资源代表的Triton VLAN。VLAN提供了一种底层方法来隔离和细分网络。一个VLAN上的流量不能，对自己，到达另一个VLAN。

trans-unit.target: 的 update 块支持以下属性：

trans-unit.target: 该 video_codec_options 映射支持以下功能：

trans-unit.target: 的 view 块支持：

trans-unit.target: 的 volume 块支持：

trans-unit.target: 的 volume 映射支持以下功能：

trans-unit.source: The vpn_client_configuration block supports:
trans-unit.target: 所述 vpn_client_configuration 块支持：

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster data source can be used to discover the ID of a cluster in vSphere. This is useful to fetch the ID of a cluster that you want to use for virtual machine placement via the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, allowing you to specify the cluster's root resource pool directly versus using the alias available through the vsphere_resource_pool data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere中集群的ID。这对于通过 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源获取要用于虚拟机放置的集群的ID很有用，从而允许您直接指定集群的根资源池，而不是使用通过 vsphere_resource_pool 数据源可用的别名。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster resource can be used to create and manage clusters of hosts allowing for resource control of compute resources, load balancing through DRS, and high availability through vSphere HA.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源可用于通过vSphere HA会创建和管理主机允许计算资源的资源控制的集群，通过负载平衡DRS和高可用性。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_host_group resource can be used to manage groups of hosts in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_host_group 资源可以被用来管理在集群主机组，无论是在由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_affinity_rule resource can be used to manage VM affinity rules in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_affinity_rule 资源可用于在集群来管理VM关联性规则，无论是创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_anti_affinity_rule resource can be used to manage VM anti-affinity rules in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_anti_affinity_rule 资源可用于在集群来管理VM反关联性规则，无论是创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_dependency_rule resource can be used to manage VM dependency rules in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_dependency_rule 资源可用于在集群来管理VM相关性规则，或者创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group resource can be used to manage groups of virtual machines in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group 资源可用于管理在一个集群的虚拟机的基团，无论是在由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule resource can be used to manage VM-to-host rules in a cluster, either created by the vsphere_compute_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule 资源可用于在集群来管理虚拟机到主机的规则，无论是在由 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_custom_attribute data source can be used to reference custom attributes that are not managed by Terraform. Its attributes are exactly the same as the vsphere_custom_attribute resource, and, like importing, the data source takes a name to search on. The id and other attributes are then populated with the data found by the search.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_custom_attribute 数据源可以用于不是由Terraform管理参考自定义属性。其属性与 vsphere_custom_attribute 资源完全相同，并且与导入一样，数据源也使用名称进行搜索。该 id 和其他属性，然后通过搜索找到的数据填充。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_custom_attribute resource can be used to create and manage custom attributes, which allow users to associate user-specific meta-information with vSphere managed objects. Custom attribute values must be strings and are stored on the vCenter Server and not the managed object.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_custom_attribute 资源可用于创建和管理自定义属性，它允许用户使用vSphere关联用户特定的元信息管理的对象。自定义属性值必须是字符串，并且存储在vCenter Server中，而不是存储在托管对象中。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_datacenter data source can be used to discover the ID of a vSphere datacenter. This can then be used with resources or data sources that require a datacenter, such as the vsphere_host data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_datacenter 数据源可以被用于发现vSphere数据中心的ID。然后可以将其与需要数据中心的资源或数据源一起使用，例如 vsphere_host 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_datastore data source can be used to discover the ID of a datastore in vSphere. This is useful to fetch the ID of a datastore that you want to use to create virtual machines in using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_datastore 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere中的数据存储的ID。这对于使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源获取要用于创建虚拟机的数据存储的ID很有用。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_datastore_cluster data source can be used to discover the ID of a datastore cluster in vSphere. This is useful to fetch the ID of a datastore cluster that you want to use to assign datastores to using the vsphere_nas_datastore or vsphere_vmfs_datastore resources, or create virtual machines in using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_datastore_cluster 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere中数据存储集群的ID。这是非常有用的，你要使用的数据存储分配来获取数据存储群集的ID使用 vsphere_nas_datastore 或 vsphere_vmfs_datastore 资源，或使用创建虚拟机 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_datastore_cluster resource can be used to create and manage datastore clusters. This can be used to create groups of datastores with a shared management interface, allowing for resource control and load balancing through Storage DRS.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_datastore_cluster 资源可用于创建和管理数据存储群集。这可用于创建具有共享管理界面的数据存储组，从而允许通过Storage DRS进行资源控制和负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_datastore_cluster_vm_anti_affinity_rule resource can be used to manage VM anti-affinity rules in a datastore cluster, either created by the vsphere_datastore_cluster resource or looked up by the vsphere_datastore_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_datastore_cluster_vm_anti_affinity_rule 资源可用于在数据存储集群来管理VM反关联性规则，无论是创建由 vsphere_datastore_cluster 资源或通过抬头 vsphere_datastore_cluster 数据源。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_distributed_port_group resource can be used to manage vSphere distributed virtual port groups. These port groups are connected to distributed virtual switches, which can be managed by the vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_distributed_port_group 资源可用于管理vSphere分布式虚拟端口组。这些端口组连接到分布式虚拟交换机，可以通过 vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch data source can be used to discover the ID and uplink data of a of a vSphere distributed virtual switch (DVS). This can then be used with resources or data sources that require a DVS, such as the vsphere_distributed_port_group resource, for which an example is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch 数据源可以被用于发现的在vSphere的ID和上行链路数据分布式虚拟交换机（DVS）。然后，可以将其与需要DVS的资源或数据源一起使用，例如 vsphere_distributed_port_group 资源，下面将举例说明。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch resource can be used to manage VMware Distributed Virtual Switches.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_distributed_virtual_switch 资源可用来管理VMware分布式虚拟交换机。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_dpm_host_override resource can be used to add a DPM override to a cluster for a particular host. This allows you to control the power management settings for individual hosts in the cluster while leaving any unspecified ones at the default power management settings.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_dpm_host_override 资源可用于一个DPM覆盖加入到集群中的一个特定的主机。这使您可以控制群集中各个主机的电源管理设置，同时将所有未指定的主机保留为默认电源管理设置。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_drs_vm_override resource can be used to add a DRS override to a cluster for a specific virtual machine. With this resource, one can enable or disable DRS and control the automation level for a single virtual machine without affecting the rest of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_drs_vm_override 资源可用于一个DRS覆盖添加到集群特定虚拟机。使用此资源，可以启用或禁用DRS并控制单个虚拟机的自动化级别，而不会影响群集的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_file resource can be used to upload files (such as virtual disk files) from the host machine that Terraform is running on to a target datastore. The resource can also be used to copy files between datastores, or from one location to another on the same datastore.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_file 资源可用于从主机机器Terraform上运行到目标数据存储上传的文件（诸如虚拟盘文件）。该资源还可以用于在数据存储之间复制文件，或在同一数据存储上从一个位置复制到另一位置。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_folder resource can be used to manage vSphere inventory folders. The resource supports creating folders of the 5 major types - datacenter folders, host and cluster folders, virtual machine folders, datastore folders, and network folders.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_folder 资源可用于管理vSphere清单中的文件夹。该资源支持创建5种主要类型的文件夹-数据中心文件夹，主机和群集文件夹，虚拟机文件夹，数据存储文件夹和网络文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_ha_vm_override resource can be used to add an override for vSphere HA settings on a cluster for a specific virtual machine. With this resource, one can control specific HA settings so that they are different than the cluster default, accommodating the needs of that specific virtual machine, while not affecting the rest of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_ha_vm_override 资源可用于在群集上添加vSphere的HA设置的覆盖特定的虚拟机。使用此资源，可以控制特定的HA设置，使其与群集默认设置不同，从而满足该特定虚拟机的需求，同时不影响群集的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_host data source can be used to discover the ID of a vSphere host. This can then be used with resources or data sources that require a host managed object reference ID.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_host 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere主机的ID。然后可以将其与需要主机托管对象引用ID的资源或数据源一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_host_port_group resource can be used to manage vSphere standard port groups on an ESXi host. These port groups are connected to standard virtual switches, which can be managed by the vsphere_host_virtual_switch resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_host_port_group 资源可用于管理ESXi主机上的vSphere标准端口组。这些端口组连接到标准虚拟交换机，可以通过 vsphere_host_virtual_switch 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_host_virtual_switch resource can be used to manage vSphere standard switches on an ESXi host. These switches can be used as a backing for standard port groups, which can be managed by the vsphere_host_port_group resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_host_virtual_switch 资源可用于在ESXi主机上管理vSphere标准交换机。这些开关可以用作标准端口组的后备端口，这些端口组可以由 vsphere_host_port_group 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_nas_datastore resource can be used to create and manage NAS datastores on an ESXi host or a set of hosts. The resource supports mounting NFS v3 and v4.1 shares to be used as datastores.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_nas_datastore 资源可用于ESXi主机或一组主机上创建和管理NAS数据存储。该资源支持装入NFS v3和v4.1共享以用作数据存储。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_network data source can be used to discover the ID of a network in vSphere. This can be any network that can be used as the backing for a network interface for vsphere_virtual_machine or any other vSphere resource that requires a network. This includes standard (host-based) port groups, DVS port groups, or opaque networks such as those managed by NSX.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_network 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere中的网络的ID。这可以是任何可用作 vsphere_virtual_machine 或任何其他需要网络的vSphere资源的网络接口的后备网络。这包括标准（基于主机）端口组，DVS端口组或不透明网络（例如由NSX管理的网络）。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_resource_pool data source can be used to discover the ID of a resource pool in vSphere. This is useful to fetch the ID of a resource pool that you want to use to create virtual machines in using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_resource_pool 数据源可以被用于发现在vSphere中的资源池的ID。这对于使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源获取要用于创建虚拟机的资源池的ID很有用。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_resource_pool resource can be used to create and manage resource pools in standalone hosts or on compute clusters.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_resource_pool 资源可用于创建和独立主机或计算机集群管理资源池。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_storage_drs_vm_override resource can be used to add a Storage DRS override to a datastore cluster for a specific virtual machine. With this resource, one can enable or disable Storage DRS, and control the automation level and disk affinity for a single virtual machine without affecting the rest of the datastore cluster.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_storage_drs_vm_override 资源可以用来存储DRS超越添加到数据存储群集特定虚拟机。使用此资源，可以启用或禁用Storage DRS，并控制单个虚拟机的自动化级别和磁盘亲和力，而不会影响其余的数据存储群集。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_tag data source can be used to reference tags that are not managed by Terraform. Its attributes are exactly the same as the vsphere_tag resource, and, like importing, the data source takes a name and category to search on. The id and other attributes are then populated with the data found by the search.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_tag 数据源可以用于不是由Terraform管理参考标记。它的属性与 vsphere_tag 资源完全相同，并且与导入一样，数据源使用名称和类别进行搜索。该 id 和其他属性，然后通过搜索找到的数据填充。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_tag resource can be used to create and manage tags, which allow you to attach metadata to objects in the vSphere inventory to make these objects more sortable and searchable.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_tag 资源可用于创建和管理标签，它允许您将元数据附加到对象在vSphere清单，使这些对象的详细排序和搜索。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_tag_category data source can be used to reference tag categories that are not managed by Terraform. Its attributes are exactly the same as the vsphere_tag_category resource, and, like importing, the data source takes a name to search on. The id and other attributes are then populated with the data found by the search.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_tag_category 数据源可以用于不是由Terraform管理参考标签的类别。其属性与 vsphere_tag_category 资源完全相同，并且与导入一样，数据源也使用名称进行搜索。该 id 和其他属性，然后通过搜索找到的数据填充。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_tag_category resource can be used to create and manage tag categories, which determine how tags are grouped together and applied to specific objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_tag_category 资源可用于创建和管理标签类，其中确定标签是如何组合在一起，并应用到特定对象。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_disk resource can be used to create virtual disks outside of any given vsphere_virtual_machine resource. These disks can be attached to a virtual machine by creating a disk sub-resource with the attach parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_disk 资源可用于创建虚拟磁盘的任何给定的外 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源。通过使用 attach 参数创建磁盘子资源，可以将这些磁盘附加到虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine data source can be used to find the UUID of an existing virtual machine or template. Its most relevant purpose is for finding the UUID of a template to be used as the source for cloning into a new vsphere_virtual_machine resource. It also reads the guest ID so that can be supplied as well.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_virtual_machine 数据源可以用于查找现有的虚拟机或模板的UUID。其最相关的目的是查找模板的UUID，以用作克隆到新的 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源的源。它还会读取来宾ID，以便也可以提供。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine resource also supports Storage DRS, allowing the assignment of virtual machines to datastore clusters. When assigned to a datastore cluster, changes to a virtual machine's underlying datastores are ignored unless disks drift outside of the datastore cluster. The example below makes use of the vsphere_datastore_cluster data source, and the datastore_cluster_id configuration setting. Note that the vsphere_datastore_cluster resource also exists to allow for management of datastore clusters directly in Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源还支持存储DRS，允许虚拟机到数据存储群集分配。分配给数据存储群集后，对虚拟机基础数据存储的更改将被忽略，除非磁盘漂移到数据存储群集之外。下面的示例使用 vsphere_datastore_cluster 数据源和 datastore_cluster_id 配置设置。请注意，还存在 vsphere_datastore_cluster 资源，以允许直接在Terraform中管理数据存储群集。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine resource can be used to manage the complex lifecycle of a virtual machine. It supports management of disk, network interface, and CDROM devices, creation from scratch or cloning from template, and migration through both host and storage vMotion.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源可以用来管理虚拟机的生命周期复杂。它支持磁盘，网络接口和CDROM设备的管理，从头开始创建或从模板克隆以及通过主机和存储vMotion进行迁移。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine resource currently only supports standard VMDK-backed virtual disks - it does not support other special kinds of disk devices like RDM disks.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源目前仅支持标准的VMDK支持的虚拟磁盘-它不支持其它特殊类型的磁盘设备像RDM磁盘。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine resource supports live migration (otherwise known as vMotion) both on the host and storage level. One can migrate the entire VM to another host, cluster, resource pool, or datastore, and migrate or pin a single disk to a specific datastore.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源支持实时迁移（也称为VMotion）连接都在主机和存储级别。可以将整个VM迁移到另一个主机，群集，资源池或数据存储，并将单个磁盘迁移或固定到特定的数据存储。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_virtual_machine_snapshot resource can be used to manage snapshots for a virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_virtual_machine_snapshot 资源可用于管理快照虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_vmfs_datastore resource can be used to create and manage VMFS datastores on an ESXi host or a set of hosts. The resource supports using any SCSI device that can generally be used in a datastore, such as local disks, or disks presented to a host or multiple hosts over Fibre Channel or iSCSI. Devices can be specified manually, or discovered using the vsphere_vmfs_disks data source.
trans-unit.target: 该 vsphere_vmfs_datastore 资源可用于ESXi主机或一组主机上创建和管理VMFS数据存储。该资源支持使用通常可在数据存储中使用的任何SCSI设备，例如本地磁盘或通过光纤通道或iSCSI提供给一个或多个主机的磁盘。可以手动指定设备，也可以使用 vsphere_vmfs_disks 数据源发现设备。

trans-unit.source: The vsphere_vmfs_disks data source can be used to discover the storage devices available on an ESXi host. This data source can be combined with the vsphere_vmfs_datastore resource to create VMFS datastores based off a set of discovered disks.
trans-unit.target: 所述 vsphere_vmfs_disks 数据源可以被用于发现ESXi主机上可用的存储设备。可以将此数据源与 vsphere_vmfs_datastore 资源结合使用，以基于一组发现的磁盘创建VMFS数据存储。

trans-unit.source: The settings block supports settings that may be applied to the zone. These may be on/off values, unitary fields, string values, integers or nested objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述设置块可施加到该区域支撑设置。这些可以是开/关值，单一字段，字符串值，整数或嵌套对象。

trans-unit.source: The target_size block supports:
trans-unit.target: 所述target_size块支持：

trans-unit.source: The version block supports:
trans-unit.target: 该版本模块支持：

trans-unit.source: The ACM certificate resource allows requesting and management of certificates from the Amazon Certificate Manager.
trans-unit.target: ACM 证书资源允许从 Amazon 证书管理器请求和管理证书。

trans-unit.source: The AMI resource allows the creation and management of a completely-custom Amazon Machine Image (AMI).
trans-unit.target: AMI资源允许创建和管理完全自定义的Amazon Machine Image（AMI）。

trans-unit.source: The API Gateway Usage Plan argument layout is a structure composed of several sub-resources - these resources are laid out below.
trans-unit.target: API Gateway 使用计划参数布局是一个由多个子资源组成的结构--这些资源在下面列出。

trans-unit.source: The API documentation covers ResourceData well, as well as the core providers in Terraform.
trans-unit.target: API文档很好地涵盖了ResourceData,以及Terraform中的核心提供者。

trans-unit.source: The API follows regular HTTP status semantics. To make implementing a complete client easier, some details on our policy and potential future status codes are listed below. A robust client should consider how to handle all of the following.
trans-unit.target: API遵循常规的HTTP状态语义。为了使实现一个完整的客户端更容易,下面列出了我们的政策和未来可能的状态代码的一些细节。一个强大的客户端应该考虑如何处理以下所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The API key is expected to be given as the first param, while the hostname is retrieved from the following environment variable:
trans-unit.target: API密钥将作为第一个参数给出,而主机名则从以下环境变量中获取。

trans-unit.source: The API key is output to stdout, but you can redirect this to a file using normal shell redirection if desired:
trans-unit.target: API密钥被输出到stdout,但如果需要的话,你可以使用普通的shell重定向将其重定向到一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The AWS Inspector Rules Packages data source allows access to the list of AWS Inspector Rules Packages which can be used by AWS Inspector within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: AWS 检查员规则包数据源允许访问 AWS 检查员规则包列表,这些规则包可由 AWS 检查员在提供商中配置的区域内使用。

trans-unit.source: The AWS member account can be imported by using the account_id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 account_id 导入AWS会员账户，例如

trans-unit.source: The AWS organization can be imported by using the id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 id 导入AWS组织，例如

trans-unit.source: The AWS provider offers a flexible means of providing credentials for authentication. The following methods are supported, in this order, and explained below:
trans-unit.target: AWS 提供商提供了一种灵活的方式来提供用于认证的凭证。按顺序支持以下方法,并在下文中进行解释。

trans-unit.source: The Alicloud provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by Alicloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Alicloud提供程序用于与Alicloud支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Alicloud provider offers a flexible means of providing credentials for authentication. The following methods are supported, in this order, and explained below:
trans-unit.target: Alicloud提供商提供了一种灵活的方式来提供凭证进行认证。按顺序支持以下方法,并在下面进行解释。

trans-unit.source: The Amazon Web Services (AWS) provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by AWS. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: 亚马逊网络服务(AWS)提供商用于与AWS支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Amazon Web Services EKS service allows for simplified management of Kubernetes servers. While the service itself is quite simple from an operator perspective, understanding how it interconnects with other pieces of the AWS service universe and how to configure local Kubernetes clients to managed clusters can be helpful.
trans-unit.target: Amazon Web Services EKS服务可简化Kubernetes服务器的管理。尽管从操作员的角度来看服务本身非常简单，但了解它如何与AWS服务世界的其他部分互连以及如何将本地Kubernetes客户端配置为托管集群可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: The Arukas provider is used to manage Arukas resources.
trans-unit.target: Arukas提供程序用于管理Arukas资源。

trans-unit.source: The Autoscaling Groups data source allows access to the list of AWS ASGs within a specific region. This will allow you to pass a list of AutoScaling Groups to other resources.
trans-unit.target: 自动缩放组数据源允许访问特定区域内的 AWS ASG 列表。这将允许您将自动缩放组列表传递给其他资源。

trans-unit.source: The Availability Zones data source allows access to the list of AWS Availability Zones which can be accessed by an AWS account within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: 可用性区数据源允许访问 AWS 可用性区列表,该列表可由提供商中配置的区域内的 AWS 账户访问。

trans-unit.source: The Azure Provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by Azure Resource Manager (AzureRM) through its APIs.
trans-unit.target: Azure Provider 用于通过其 API 与 Azure Resource Manager (AzureRM)支持的众多资源进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The Azure Service Management provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by Azure. The provider needs to be configured with a publish settings file and optionally a subscription ID before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Azure服务管理提供程序用于与Azure支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用提供程序之前，需要为其配置发布设置文件和可选的订阅ID。

trans-unit.source: The Azure Stack Provider is used to manage resources in Azure Stack via the Azure Resource Manager API's.
trans-unit.target: Azure Stack Provider 用于通过 Azure Resource Manager API 管理 Azure Stack 中的资源。

trans-unit.source: The Batch Compute Environment data source allows access to details of a specific compute environment within AWS Batch.
trans-unit.target: 批量计算环境数据源允许访问AWS Batch中特定计算环境的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Batch Job Queue data source allows access to details of a specific job queue within AWS Batch.
trans-unit.target: 批量作业队列数据源允许访问AWS Batch中特定作业队列的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Best Practices section is a work in progress, with more sections to come.
trans-unit.target: 最佳实践部分正在进行中,以后还会有更多的部分。

trans-unit.source: The Bitbucket provider allows you to manage resources including repositories, webhooks, and default reviewers.
trans-unit.target: Bitbucket提供者允许你管理资源,包括资源库、webhooks和默认的审查者。

trans-unit.source: The CLI configuration file configures per-user settings for CLI behaviors, which apply across all Terraform working directories. This is separate from your infrastructure configuration.
trans-unit.target: CLI配置文件为CLI行为配置每个用户的设置，这些设置适用于所有Terraform工作目录。这与基础结构配置是分开的。

trans-unit.source: The CLI usage and output of the state commands is structured to be friendly for Unix tools such as grep, awk, etc. Additionally, the CLI insulates users from any format changes within the state itself. The Terraform project will keep the CLI working while the state format underneath it may shift.
trans-unit.target: CLI的用法和状态命令的输出结构是为了方便Unix工具,如grep、awk等。此外,CLI还能使用户免受状态本身的任何格式变化的影响。Terraform项目将保持CLI的工作,而它下面的状态格式可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: The CRUD operations in more detail, along with their contracts:
trans-unit.target: 更详细的CRUD操作,以及其合同。

trans-unit.source: The Canonical User ID data source allows access to the canonical user ID for the effective account in which Terraform is working.
trans-unit.target: 规范用户ID数据源允许访问Terraform在其中工作的有效帐户的规范用户ID。

trans-unit.source: The Canonical User ID data source allows access to the canonical user ID for the effective account in which Terraform is working.
trans-unit.target: 规范用户ID数据源允许访问Terraform在其中工作的有效帐户的规范用户ID。

trans-unit.source: The Circonus provider gives the ability to manage a Circonus account.
trans-unit.target: Circonus 提供商提供了管理 Circonus 账户的能力。

trans-unit.source: The CloudFormation Export data source allows access to stack exports specified in the Output section of the Cloudformation Template using the optional Export Property.
trans-unit.target: CloudFormation导出数据源允许使用可选的Export属性访问在Cloudformation模板的Output部分中指定的堆栈导出。

trans-unit.source: The CloudFormation Export data source allows access to stack exports specified in the Output section of the Cloudformation Template using the optional Export Property.
trans-unit.target: CloudFormation导出数据源允许使用可选的Export属性访问在Cloudformation模板的Output部分中指定的堆栈导出。

trans-unit.source: The CloudFormation Stack data source allows access to stack outputs and other useful data including the template body.
trans-unit.target: CloudFormation Stack数据源允许访问堆栈输出和其他有用数据,包括模板主体。

trans-unit.source: The CloudFront distribution argument layout is a complex structure composed of several sub-resources - these resources are laid out below.
trans-unit.target: CloudFront 分布参数布局是一个由多个子资源组成的复杂结构--这些资源在下面列出。

trans-unit.source: The CloudStack provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by CloudStack. The provider needs to be configured with a URL pointing to a running CloudStack API and the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: CloudStack 提供者用于与 CloudStack 支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要对其进行配置,使其具有指向运行中的 CloudStack API 的 URL 和适当的凭证。

trans-unit.source: The Cloudflare provider is used to interact with the DNS resources supported by Cloudflare. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Cloudflare 提供者用于与 Cloudflare 支持的 DNS 资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Cobbler provider is used to interact with a locally installed Cobbler service. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Cobbler提供程序用于与本地安装的Cobbler服务进行交互。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Cobbler provider is used to interact with a locally installed Cobbler service. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Cobbler提供程序用于与本地安装的Cobbler服务进行交互。必须先使用正确的凭据配置提供程序，然后才能使用它。

trans-unit.source: The CodeCommit Repository data source allows the ARN, Repository ID, Repository URL for HTTP and Repository URL for SSH to be retrieved for an CodeCommit repository.
trans-unit.target: CodeCommit 仓库数据源允许检索一个 CodeCommit 仓库的 ARN、仓库 ID、HTTP 的仓库 URL 和 SSH 的仓库 URL。

trans-unit.source: The Cognito Identity Pool Roles Attachment argument layout is a structure composed of several sub-resources - these resources are laid out below.
trans-unit.target: Cognito Identity Pool Roles Attachment参数布局是一个由多个子资源组成的结构--这些资源的布局如下。

trans-unit.source: The Cognito Identity Pool argument layout is a structure composed of several sub-resources - these resources are laid out below.
trans-unit.target: Cognito身份池的参数布局是一个由多个子资源组成的结构--这些资源在下面列出。

trans-unit.source: The DNS provider supports DNS updates (RFC 2136). Additionally, the provider can be configured with secret key based transaction authentication (RFC 2845).
trans-unit.target: DNS提供商支持DNS更新(RFC 2136)。此外,该提供商可以配置基于秘钥的事务认证(RFC 2845)。

trans-unit.source: The DNSMadeEasy provider is used to interact with the resources supported by DNSMadeEasy. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: DNSMadeEasy提供者用于与DNSMadeEasy支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The DNSimple provider is used to interact with the resources supported by DNSimple. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: DNSimple提供者用于与DNSimple支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Dataflow resource is considered 'existing' while it is in a nonterminal state. If it reaches a terminal state (e.g. 'FAILED', 'COMPLETE', 'CANCELLED'), it will be recreated on the next 'apply'. This is as expected for jobs which run continously, but may surprise users who use this resource for other kinds of Dataflow jobs.
trans-unit.target: 当数据流资源处于非终端状态时,它被认为是 "现有的"。如果它达到终端状态(如 "FAILED"、"COMPLETE"、"CANCELLED"),它将在下一次 "应用 "时被重新创建。这是对持续运行的作业的预期,但可能会让那些将此资源用于其他类型的Dataflow作业的用户感到惊讶。

trans-unit.source: The DigitalOcean (DO) provider is used to interact with the resources supported by DigitalOcean. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: DigitalOcean(DO)提供商用于与DigitalOcean支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置该提供者。

trans-unit.source: The Dns Domain Groups data source provides a list of Alicloud Dns Domain Groups in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Dns Domain Groups数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Dns Domain Groups列表。

trans-unit.source: The Dns Domain Records data source provides a list of Alicloud Dns Domain Records in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Dns Domain Records数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Dns Domain Records列表。

trans-unit.source: The Dns Domains data source provides a list of Alicloud Dns Domains in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Dns Domains数据源根据指定的过滤器提供了一个Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Dns Domains列表。

trans-unit.source: The Docker provider is used to interact with Docker containers and images. It uses the Docker API to manage the lifecycle of Docker containers. Because the Docker provider uses the Docker API, it is immediately compatible not only with single server Docker but Swarm and any additional Docker-compatible API hosts.
trans-unit.target: Docker提供者用于与Docker容器和镜像交互。它使用Docker API来管理Docker容器的生命周期。因为Docker提供者使用Docker API,所以它不仅可以立即兼容单服务器Docker,还可以兼容Swarm和任何其他兼容Docker的API主机。

trans-unit.source: The Dyn provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Dyn. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Dyn提供者用于与Dyn支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The DynamoDB API expects attribute structure (name and type) to be passed along when creating or updating GSI/LSIs or creating the initial table. In these cases it expects the Hash / Range keys to be provided; because these get re-used in numerous places (i.e the table's range key could be a part of one or more GSIs), they are stored on the table object to prevent duplication and increase consistency. If you add attributes here that are not used in these scenarios it can cause an infinite loop in planning.
trans-unit.target: DynamoDB API希望在创建或更新GSI/LSI或创建初始表时传递属性结构(名称和类型)。在这些情况下,它希望提供哈希/范围键;因为这些属性会在许多地方被重复使用(即表的范围键可能是一个或多个GSI的一部分),所以它们被存储在表对象上,以防止重复并提高一致性。如果你在这里添加了在这些场景中不使用的属性,就会造成规划的无限循环。

trans-unit.source: The ECR Repository data source allows the ARN, Repository URI and Registry ID to be retrieved for an ECR repository.
trans-unit.target: ECR 存储库数据源允许检索 ECR 存储库的 ARN、存储库 URI 和注册表 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ECS Cluster data source allows access to details of a specific cluster within an AWS ECS service.
trans-unit.target: ECS集群数据源允许访问AWS ECS服务中特定集群的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The ECS Service data source allows access to details of a specific Service within a AWS ECS Cluster.
trans-unit.target: ECS服务数据源允许访问AWS ECS集群内特定服务的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The ECS container definition data source allows access to details of a specific container within an AWS ECS service.
trans-unit.target: ECS容器定义数据源允许访问AWS ECS服务中特定容器的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The ECS task definition data source allows access to details of a specific AWS ECS task definition.
trans-unit.target: ECS任务定义数据源允许访问特定AWS ECS任务定义的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The EFS file systems can be imported using the id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 id 导入EFS文件系统，例如

trans-unit.source: The EFS mount targets can be imported using the id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 id 导入EFS挂载目标，例如

trans-unit.source: The EKS service does not currently provide managed resources for running worker nodes. Here we will create a few operator managed resources so that Kubernetes can properly manage other AWS services, networking access, and finally a configuration that allows automatic scaling of worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: EKS服务目前不提供运行工人节点的管理资源。在这里,我们将创建一些运营商管理资源,以便Kubernetes可以正确管理其他AWS服务、网络访问,最后是允许自动缩放工人节点的配置。

trans-unit.source: The EKS service does not provide a cluster-level API parameter or resource to automatically configure the underlying Kubernetes cluster to allow worker nodes to join the cluster via AWS IAM role authentication.
trans-unit.target: EKS服务没有提供群集级API参数或资源来自动配置底层Kubernetes群集,以允许工人节点通过AWS IAM角色认证加入群集。

trans-unit.source: The Extending Terraform section contains content for users who wish to extend Terraform. The intended audience is anyone wanting to add or edit source code (“developers”) for either Terraform itself or a Terraform Plugin. The content assumes you have basic operating knowledge or experience using Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 扩展Terraform部分包含希望扩展Terraform的用户的内容。目标受众是希望为Terraform本身或Terraform插件添加或编辑源代码的任何人（“开发人员”）。内容假定您具有使用Terraform的基本操作知识或经验。

trans-unit.source: The Fastly provider is used to interact with the content delivery network (CDN) provided by Fastly.
trans-unit.target: Fastly提供商用于与Fastly提供的内容传输网络(CDN)进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The Fastly provider offers an API key based method of providing credentials for authentication. The following methods are supported, in this order, and explained below:
trans-unit.target: Fastly提供商提供了一种基于API密钥的方法,为认证提供凭证。按顺序支持以下方法,并在下面进行解释。

trans-unit.source: The FlexibleEngine provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by FlexibleEngine. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: FlexibleEngine提供者用于与FlexibleEngine支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The GitHub provider is used to interact with GitHub organization resources.
trans-unit.target: GitHub提供者用于与GitHub组织资源交互。

trans-unit.source: The GitLab provider is used to interact with GitLab group or user resources.
trans-unit.target: GitLab提供者用于与GitLab组或用户资源进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The GoDoc for helper/schema can be found here. This is API-level documentation but will be extremely important for you going forward.
trans-unit.target: 可以在此处找到用于 helper/schema 的GoDoc 。这是API级别的文档，但对您而言非常重要。

trans-unit.source: The Google Cloud provider is used to interact with Google Cloud services. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Google Cloud提供程序用于与Google Cloud服务进行交互。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Google Cloud storage signed URL data source generates a signed URL for a given storage object. Signed URLs provide a way to give time-limited read or write access to anyone in possession of the URL, regardless of whether they have a Google account.
trans-unit.target: Google 云存储签名 URL 数据源为给定存储对象生成签名 URL。签名 URL 提供了一种方式,可让拥有 URL 的任何人都能获得有时间限制的读或写访问权限,无论他们是否拥有 Google 帐户。

trans-unit.source: The Google Compute Engine Instance Group Manager API creates and manages pools of homogeneous Compute Engine virtual machine instances from a common instance template. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Google Compute Engine实例组管理器API通过通用实例模板创建和管理同类Compute Engine虚拟机实例的池。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: The Google Compute Engine Regional Instance Group Manager API creates and manages pools of homogeneous Compute Engine virtual machine instances from a common instance template. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Google Compute Engine区域实例组管理器API通过通用实例模板创建和管理同类Compute Engine虚拟机实例的池。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: The Grafana provider configures data sources and dashboards in Grafana, which is a web application for creating, viewing and sharing metrics dashboards.
trans-unit.target: Grafana提供程序在Grafana（用于创建，查看和共享指标仪表板的Web应用程序）中配置数据源和仪表板。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP provider is a utility provider for interacting with generic HTTP servers as part of a Terraform configuration.
trans-unit.target: HTTP提供者是一个实用的提供者,用于与通用HTTP服务器交互,作为Terraform配置的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The Heroku provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Heroku. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Heroku提供者用于与Heroku支持的资源进行交互。提供者在使用前需要配置适当的凭证。

trans-unit.source: The Hetzner Cloud (hcloud) provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Hetzner Cloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Hetzner云(hcloud)提供商用于与Hetzner云支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The IAM Account Alias data source allows access to the account alias for the effective account in which Terraform is working.
trans-unit.target: 通过IAM账户别名数据源,可以访问Terraform工作的有效账户的账户别名。

trans-unit.source: The IAM policy document format allows context variables to be interpolated into various strings within a statement. The native IAM policy document format uses ${...}-style syntax that is in conflict with Terraform's interpolation syntax, so this data source instead uses &{...} syntax for interpolations that should be processed by AWS rather than by Terraform.
trans-unit.target: IAM策略文档格式允许将上下文变量内插到语句中的各种字符串中。本地IAM策略文档格式使用与Terraform插值语法冲突的 ${...} 样式语法，因此此数据源将 &{...} 语法用于应由AWS而非Terraform处理的插值。

trans-unit.source: The Icinga2 provider is used to configure hosts to be monitored by Icinga2 servers. The provider needs to be configured with the API URL of the Icinga2 server and credentials for an API user with the appropriate permissions.
trans-unit.target: Icinga2提供程序用于配置要由Icinga2服务器监视的主机。需要使用Icinga2服务器的API URL和具有适当权限的API用户的凭据来配置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The Ignition provider is used to generate Ignition configuration files. Ignition is the provisioning utility used by CoreOS Linux.
trans-unit.target: Ignition提供程序用于生成Ignition配置文件。Ignition是CoreOS Linux 使用的置备实用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Images data source list image resource list contains private images of the user and images of system resources provided by Alicloud, as well as other public images and those available on the image market.
trans-unit.target: 图片数据源列表图片资源列表中包含了用户的私有图片和Alicloud提供的系统资源图片,以及其他公共图片和图片市场上的图片。

trans-unit.source: The InfluxDB provider allows Terraform to create Databases in InfluxDB. InfluxDB is a database server optimized for time-series data.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB提供程序允许Terraform在InfluxDB中创建数据库。InfluxDB是针对时间序列数据优化的数据库服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Instance Types data source list the ecs_instance_types of Alicloud.
trans-unit.target: Instance Types数据源列出了Alicloud的ecs_instance_types。

trans-unit.source: The Instances data source list ECS instance resource accoring to its ID, name regex, image id, status and other fields.
trans-unit.target: 实例数据源根据其ID、名称、图像ID、状态等字段列出ECS实例资源。

trans-unit.source: The KMS ciphertext data source allows you to encrypt plaintext into ciphertext by using an AWS KMS customer master key.
trans-unit.target: KMS密文数据源允许您使用AWS KMS客户主密钥将明文加密为密文。

trans-unit.source: The KMS keys data source provides a list of Alicloud KMS keys in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: KMS密钥数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud KMS密钥列表。

trans-unit.source: The KMS secret data source allows you to use data encrypted with the AWS KMS service within your resource definitions.
trans-unit.target: KMS秘密数据源允许您在您的资源定义中使用与AWS KMS服务加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: The Key Pairs data source provides a list of Alicloud Key Pairs in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Key Pairs数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Key Pairs列表。

trans-unit.source: The Kubernetes (K8S) provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Kubernetes. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Kubernetes (K8S)提供者用于与Kubernetes支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Librato provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Librato. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Librato提供者用于与Librato支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,提供者需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Local provider is used to manage local resources, such as files.
trans-unit.target: 本地提供者用于管理本地资源,如文件。

trans-unit.source: The Logentries provider is used to manage Logentries logs and log sets. Logentries provides live log management and analytics. The provider needs to be configured with a Logentries account key before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Logentries提供商用于管理Logentries日志和日志集。Logentries 提供实时日志管理和分析。在使用该提供商之前,需要用 Logentries 账户密钥进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The LogicMonitor provider is used to interact with the resources supported by LogicMonitor. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: LogicMonitor 提供者用于与 LogicMonitor 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要使用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Mailgun provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Mailgun. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Mailgun 提供者用于与 Mailgun 支持的资源交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The Managed Object Browser (MOB) allows one to browse the entire vSphere inventory as it's presented to the API. It's normally accessed via https://VSPHERE_SERVER/mob. For more information, see here.
trans-unit.target: 托管对象浏览器（MOB）允许浏览提供给API的整个vSphere清单。通常可以通过 https://VSPHERE_SERVER/mob 进行访问。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: The NS1 provider exposes resources to interact with the NS1 REST API. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: NS1 提供者公开了与 NS1 REST API 交互的资源。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform Provider
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform供应商

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform provider can be used to manage logical networking and security constructs in NSX. This includes logical switching, routing and firewall.
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform提供商可用于管理NSX中的逻辑网络和安全构造。这包括逻辑交换、路由和防火墙。

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform provider gives the NSX administrator a way to automate NSX to provide virtualized networking and security services using both ESXi and KVM based hypervisor hosts as well as container networking and security.
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform提供商为NSX管理员提供了一种方法,使NSX能够自动化地使用基于ESXi和KVM的管理程序主机提供虚拟化网络和安全服务,以及容器网络和安全。

trans-unit.source: The NSX provider offers several ways to authenticate to the NSX manager. Credentials can be provided statically or provided as environment variables. In addition, client certificates can be used for authentication. For authentication with certificates Terraform will require a certificate file and private key file in PEM format. To use client certificates the client certificate needs to be registered with NSX-T manager prior to invoking Terraform.
trans-unit.target: NSX 提供商提供了几种方法来验证到 NSX 管理器的身份。可以静态地提供凭证,也可以作为环境变量提供。此外,客户端证书也可用于身份验证。对于使用证书进行身份验证,Terraform需要PEM格式的证书文件和私钥文件。要使用客户端证书,需要在调用Terraform之前,在NSX-T管理器中注册客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: The OVH provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OVH. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.

trans-unit.source: The OpenStack provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OpenStack. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.

The provider needs to be configured with credentials for the Oracle Cloud Account.

trans-unit.source: The PostgreSQL provider gives the ability to deploy and configure resources in a PostgreSQL server.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL提供者提供了在PostgreSQL服务器中部署和配置资源的能力。

trans-unit.source: The PowerDNS provider is used manipulate DNS records supported by PowerDNS server. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used. It supports both the legacy API and the new version 1 API, however resources may need to be configured differently.
trans-unit.target: PowerDNS提供程序用于处理PowerDNS服务器支持的DNS记录。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。它同时支持旧版API和新版本1 API，但是可能需要对资源进行不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: The Profile Setting is implicitly chosen based on what params are configured for the security rule. If you want a Profile Setting of Group, then the group param should be set to the desired Group Profile. If you want a Profile Setting of Profiles, then you will need to specify one or more of the following params:

trans-unit.source: The ProfitBricks provider gives the ability to deploy and configure resources using the ProfitBricks Cloud API.
trans-unit.target: ProfitBricks提供商提供了使用ProfitBricks Cloud API部署和配置资源的能力。

trans-unit.source: The Provider Schema
trans-unit.target: 提供者模式

trans-unit.source: The Ram Account Alias data source provides an alias for the Alicloud account.
trans-unit.target: Ram账户别名数据源提供了Alicloud账户的别名。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Groups data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Groups in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Groups数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中Alicloud Ram Groups的列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Policies data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Policies in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram策略数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram策略列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Roles data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Roles in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Roles数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram Roles列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Users data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Users in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Users数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram用户列表。

trans-unit.source: The Rancher provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Rancher. The provider needs to be configured with the URL of the Rancher server at minimum and API credentials if access control is enabled on the server.
trans-unit.target: Rancher提供者用于与Rancher支持的资源进行交互。提供者至少需要配置Rancher服务器的URL,如果服务器上启用了访问控制,则需要配置API凭证。

trans-unit.source: The Regions data source allows access to the list of Alicloud Regions.
trans-unit.target: 区域数据源允许访问Alicloud区域列表。

trans-unit.source: The Replication Controller allows you to replicate pods. This is useful for maintaining overall availability and scalability of your application exposed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 复制控制器允许您复制豆荚。这对于维护您暴露在用户面前的应用程序的整体可用性和可扩展性非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The Rundeck provider allows Terraform to create and configure Projects, Jobs and Keys in Rundeck. Rundeck is a tool for runbook automation and execution of arbitrary management tasks, allowing operators to avoid logging in to individual machines directly via SSH.
trans-unit.target: 该Rundeck提供商允许Terraform创建和配置项目，乔布斯和键，Rundeck。Rundeck是用于运行手册自动化和执行任意管理任务的工具，使操作员可以避免直接通过SSH登录到各个计算机。

trans-unit.source: The Runscope provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Runscope. The provider needs to be configured with an access token before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Runscope 提供者用于与 Runscope 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用访问令牌进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The S3 backend can be used in a number of different ways that make different tradeoffs between convenience, security, and isolation in such an organization. This section describes one such approach that aims to find a good compromise between these tradeoffs, allowing use of Terraform's workspaces feature to switch conveniently between multiple isolated deployments of the same configuration.
trans-unit.target: S3后端可以以多种不同方式使用，从而在此类组织中的便利性，安全性和隔离性之间做出不同的权衡。本节介绍了一种这样的方法，其目的是在这些折衷之间找到一个良好的折衷，从而允许使用Terraform的工作区功能在同一配置的多个独立部署之间方便地进行切换。

trans-unit.source: The S3 object data source allows access to the metadata and optionally (see below) content of an object stored inside S3 bucket.
trans-unit.target: S3对象数据源允许访问存储在S3存储桶中的对象的元数据和可选的内容（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: The Scaleway provider is used to manage Scaleway resources.
trans-unit.target: Scaleway提供商用于管理Scaleway资源。

trans-unit.source: The Schema attribute Type defines what kind of values users can provide in their configuration for this element. Here we define the available schema types supported. See Schema Behaviors for more information on configuring element behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 架构属性 Type 定义用户可以在其配置中为此元素提供哪些类型的值。在这里，我们定义了支持的可用模式类型。有关配置元素行为的更多信息，请参见模式行为。

trans-unit.source: The Schema package is a high-level framework for easily writing Plugins for Terraform. Providers (with Resources and/or Data Sources), and Provisioners are all defined in terms of the Schema package, which includes builtin types and methods for developers to use when writing plugins.
trans-unit.target: Schema包是一个高级框架,可以方便地编写Terraform的插件。提供者(包括资源和/或数据源)和供应者都是在Schema包中定义的,其中包括内置的类型和方法,供开发人员在编写插件时使用。

trans-unit.source: The Security Groups data source provides a list of Security Groups in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: 安全组数据源根据指定的过滤器提供一个Alicloud账户中的安全组列表。

trans-unit.source: The Server Load Balancer instance attached with VPC-type ECS instances cannot be attached to the scaling group.
trans-unit.target: 与VPC型ECS实例相连接的服务器负载均衡器实例不能连接到缩放组。

trans-unit.source: The Server Load Balancer instance must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 必须启用服务器负载均衡器实例。

trans-unit.source: The Service resource requires a domain name that is correctly set up to direct traffic to the Fastly service. See Fastly's guide on Adding CNAME Records on their documentation site for guidance.
trans-unit.target: 服务资源需要正确设置的域名，才能将流量定向到Fastly服务。有关指导，请参见其文档站点上的快速添加CNAME记录指南。

trans-unit.source: The SoftLayer provider is used to manage SoftLayer resources.
trans-unit.target: SoftLayer提供者用于管理SoftLayer资源。

trans-unit.source: The Spotinst provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Spotinst. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Spotinst提供者用于与Spotinst支持的资源进行交互。提供者在使用之前需要用适当的凭证进行配置.

trans-unit.source: The StatusCake provider allows Terraform to create and configure tests in StatusCake. StatusCake is a tool that helps to monitor the uptime of your service via a network of monitoring centers throughout the world
trans-unit.target: StatusCake提供程序允许Terraform在StatusCake中创建和配置测试。StatusCake是一种工具，可通过遍布全球的监控中心网络来监控您的服务的正常运行时间

trans-unit.source: The TLS provider provides utilities for working with Transport Layer Security keys and certificates. It provides resources that allow private keys, certificates and certficate requests to be created as part of a Terraform deployment.
trans-unit.target: TLS提供程序提供了用于处理传输层安全性密钥和证书的实用程序。它提供的资源允许将私钥，证书和认证请求创建为Terraform部署的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The TelefonicaOpenCloud provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by TelefonicaOpenCloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: TelefonicaOpenCloud提供商用于与TelefonicaOpenCloud支持的众多资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform CLI commands interact with the HashiCorp service Checkpoint to check for the availability of new versions and for critical security bulletins about the current version.
trans-unit.target: Terraform CLI命令与HashiCorp服务检查点进行交互，以检查新版本的可用性以及有关当前版本的重要安全公告。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry is integrated directly into Terraform to make consuming modules easy. See the usage information.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Registry直接集成到Terraform中，以简化使用模块。请参阅用法信息。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry is integrated directly into Terraform. This makes it easy to reference any module in the registry. The syntax for referencing a registry module is <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER>. For example: hashicorp/consul/aws.
trans-unit.target: Terraform注册表直接集成到Terraform中。这使引用注册表中的任何模块变得容易。引用注册表模块的语法为 <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER> 。例如： hashicorp/consul/aws 。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry uses tags to detect releases.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Registry使用标签来检测发布。

For example, to test the azurerm_public_ip resource, an azurerm_resource_group is required. This results in configuration which looks like this:

trans-unit.source: The Terraform state subcommands all work with remote state just as if it was local state. Reads and writes may take longer than normal as each read and each write do a full network roundtrip. Otherwise, backups are still written to disk and the CLI usage is the same as if it were local state.
trans-unit.target: Terraform状态子命令对远程状态的工作就像对本地状态一样。读和写的时间可能比正常情况下要长,因为每次读和每次写都要做一个完整的网络往返。否则,备份还是会写入磁盘,CLI的用法和本地状态一样。

trans-unit.source: The Traffic Manager is created with the location global.
trans-unit.target: 创建的流量管理器的位置为 global 。

trans-unit.source: The Triton provider is used to interact with resources in Joyent's Triton cloud. It is compatible with both public- and on-premise installations of Triton. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Triton提供商用于与Joyent的Triton云中的资源进行交互。它与 Triton 的公共和内部安装兼容。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The URLs are computed entirely offline - as long as the project exists, they will be valid, but this data source does not contact Google Container Registry (GCR) at any point.
trans-unit.target: 这些URLs完全是离线计算的--只要项目存在,它们就会有效,但这个数据源在任何时候都不会联系Google Container Registry(GCR)。

trans-unit.target: Git 仓库的 URL 支持以下查询参数。

trans-unit.source: The UltraDNS provider is used to interact with the resources supported by UltraDNS. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: UltraDNS提供者用于与UltraDNS支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The VMware vCloud Director provider is used to interact with the resources supported by VMware vCloud Director. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: VMware vCloud Director 提供者用于与 VMware vCloud Director 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要使用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The VMware vSphere provider gives Terraform the ability to work with VMware vSphere Products, notably vCenter Server and ESXi. This provider can be used to manage many aspects of a VMware vSphere environment, including virtual machines, standard and distributed networks, datastores, and more.
trans-unit.target: VMware vSphere提供程序使Terraform能够与VMware vSphere产品（尤其是vCenter Server和ESXi）一起使用。该提供程序可用于管理VMware vSphere环境的许多方面，包括虚拟机，标准和分布式网络，数据存储等。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Endpoint Service data source details about a specific service that can be specified when creating a VPC endpoint within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: VPC端点服务数据源详细介绍了在提供商中配置的区域内创建VPC端点时可以指定的特定服务。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Endpoint data source provides details about a specific VPC endpoint.
trans-unit.target: VPC端点数据源提供有关特定VPC端点的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Peering Connection data source provides details about a specific VPC peering connection.
trans-unit.target: VPC对等连接数据源提供有关特定VPC对等连接的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPCs data source lists a number of VPCs resource information owned by an Alicloud account.
trans-unit.target: VPCs数据源列出了一个Alicloud账户拥有的一些VPCs资源信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPN Gateway data source provides details about a specific VPN gateway.
trans-unit.target: VPN网关数据源提供了有关特定VPN网关的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Vault provider allows Terraform to read from, write to, and configure Hashicorp Vault.
trans-unit.target: Vault提供程序允许Terraform读取，写入和配置Hashicorp Vault。

trans-unit.source: The Virtual sunbet data source lists a list of vswitches resource information owned by an Alicloud account, and each vswitch including its basic attribution, VPC ID and containing ECS instance IDs.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟sunbet数据源列出了一个Alicloud账户所拥有的vswitch资源信息列表,每个vswitch包括其基本归属、VPC ID和包含ECS实例ID。

trans-unit.source: The Zones data source allows access to the list of Alicloud Zones which can be accessed by an Alicloud account within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: Zones数据源允许访问Alicloud Zones列表,Alicloud账户可以在提供商配置的区域内访问这些Zones。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the DHCP relay profile named dr_profile with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令将导入名为 dr_profile 的DHCP中继配置文件，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the DHCP relay service named dr_service with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为 dr_service 的DHCP中继服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the IGMP based networking and security service named ns_service_igmp with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_igmp 的基于IGMP的网络和安全服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the IP protocol based networking and security service named ns_service_ip with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_ip 的基于IP协议的网络服务和安全性服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the IP set named ip_set1 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上述命令将导入IP设置名为 ip_set1 与NSX ID UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the NAT rule named rule1 with the number id nat-rule-num that belongs to the tier 1 logical router with the NSX id logical-router-uuid.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为 rule1 nat-rule-num 的NAT规则，该规则属于具有NSX id logical-router-uuid 的第1层逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the algorithm based networking and security service named ns_service_alg with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_alg 的基于算法的网络和安全服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the ethernet type networking and security service named etns with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为 etns 的以太网类型的网络和安全服务，其名称为NSX id UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the firewall section named firewall_sect with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为NS_ID UUID 的防火墙部分 firewall_sect 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the layer 4 port based networking and security service named ns_service_l4 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_l4 的具有NSX ID UUID 的基于第4层端口的网络和安全服务。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical port named logical_port with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 logical_port 为 UUID 的逻辑端口。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical router downlink port named downlink_port with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为NSX id UUID 的逻辑路由器下行链路端口，名为 downlink_port 链路端口。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical router link port on the tier 0 logical router named link_port_tier0 with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical router link port on the tier 1 router named link_port_tier1 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令使用NSX ID UUID link_port_tier1 名为link_port_tier1的第1层路由器上的逻辑路由器链接端口。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical switch named switch1 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为 switch1 的逻辑交换机，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical tier 1 router named tier1_router with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 tier1_router 的逻辑1层路由器，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the networking and security group named group2 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 group2 id UUID 的网络和安全组group2。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the static route named static_route with the number static-route-num that belongs to the tier 1 logical router with the NSX id logical-router-uuid.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 static_route 的静态路由，该静态路由的编号为 static-route-num ，该编号属于具有NSX id logical-router-uuid 的第1层逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.target: 上面的示例将使用来自公共注册表的AWS的Consul模块。

trans-unit.source: The above import is considered a "simple import": one resource is imported into the state file. An import may also result in a "complex import" where multiple resources are imported. For example, an AWS security group imports an aws_security_group but also one aws_security_group_rule for each rule.

trans-unit.source: The automatic plugin installation behavior can be overridden by extracting the desired providers into a local directory and using the additional option -plugin-dir=PATH. When this option is specified, only the given directory is consulted, which prevents Terraform from making requests to the plugin repository or looking for plugins in other local directories. Passing an empty string to -plugin-dir removes any previously recorded paths.
trans-unit.target: 通过将所需的提供程序提取到本地目录中并使用附加选项 -plugin-dir=PATH ,可以覆盖自动插件安装行为。指定此选项后，仅查询给定目录，这将阻止Terraform向插件存储库发出请求或在其他本地目录中查找插件。将空字符串传递给 -plugin-dir 会删除以前记录的所有路径。

trans-unit.source: The automation level can be further tuned for each specific SDRS subsystem. Specifying an override will set the automation level for that part of Storage DRS to the respective level. Not specifying an override infers that you want to use the cluster default automation level.
trans-unit.target: 可针对每个特定 SDRS 子系统进一步调整自动化级别。指定覆盖将为存储 DRS 的该部分设置自动化级别到相应的级别。不指定覆盖意味着您要使用群集默认自动化级别。

trans-unit.source: The configuration within the loaded files are appended to each other. This is in contrast to being merged. This means that two resources with the same name are not merged, and will instead cause a validation error. This is in contrast to overrides, which do merge.
